data.name: LayerBridge
data.notes:
**LayerBridge** is a registered company in Romania with Fiscal ID: 32101070 and Chamber of Commerce ID: J40/9776/2013, which offers datacenter services, such as [colocation](https://www.hetnix.com/colocation), [dedicated servers](https://www.hetnix.com/dedicated-servers) and [virtual servers](https://www.hetnix.com/kvm-servers) in Romania.

**LayerBridge** operates **ROPN-IX** at this location.

**ROPN-IX** or the **Romanian Open Internet Exchange**, is an open IXP located in Romania. It's main goal is to offer the possibility of interconnection for it's members free of charge* without membership or port fees or any other absurd costs.
For the moment, we only allow Electric (RJ45) 1 Gbps ports and 10GbE SFP+ Ports.

* For the moment, limited to 1 Gbps ports or 1x 10GbE port.

Operating **AS60113** for the route servers.

* Joining to the IXP via a LayerBridge VM is possible: **[ROPN-IX](https://mserver.ro/cart.php?a=add&pid=164)**.
